nodes.text: The Resistance fighter jacket was a type of flight jacket worn by members of the Resistance. Poe Dameron wore one such jacket approximately thirty years after the Battle of Endor when he went to a village on Jakku, but lost it when the TIE/sf space superiority fighter he and the former First Order stormtrooper Finn were using to escape the First Order crashed on Jakku. Finn retrieved the jacket and wore it for some time, but had it taken away after the Battle of Starkiller Base.
